system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user may freely move using a Movement Score of their choice, and gains Braced 1.
Resolution: On their next activation, they attack with and resolve Freeze Shock. On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining Paralysis 5.

actions.name: Freeze Shock
